introduction: The following program makes your mum jokes by incorporating ideas from a prompt. A your mum joke is a joke which the words "your mum" must appear in it, and is meant to be used as a funny response to the given prompt. The joke does not need to make logical sense, but it has to be grammatically correct.

samples.prompt: When you try to wall off the sea, communities here learned, the sea prevails.
samples.joke: Your mum prevails when you try to wall off the sea.

samples.prompt: The Galapagos Islands is the home to 25 thousand people.
samples.joke: Your mum is the home to 25 thousand people.

defaultResponse: I will not make fun of your mum this time.
